projects.title: An interactive CLI made with NodeJS and Inquirer
projects.description:
This is a simple interactive CLI example made with NodeJS and Inquirer.
In this example I created it to init my project directory.
After some questions, the tool will do the following:
1. creates the project directory with the next number
2. creates the README file from a template (like this one)
3. adds the reference line in the main README file
4. creates a new git branch
5. commits first files
6. opens VSCode and open the README file for change

projects.title: PowerShell tools for lazy creators
projects.description: This PowerShell script contains tools I like to use when developing. This project will growth as I'll find new useful commands and tips to add.

projects.title: My VS Code plugins and config
projects.description: In this project, I'll put the evolution of the useful plugins list I use and my setup configuration for VS Code.

projects.title: Regenerate state.json for p1
projects.description: We need a tool to be able to regenerate the `state.json` file if something goes wrong.

projects.title: Typescript boilerplate
projects.description: This is a simple boilerplate to use for a Typescript multi-packages project. ESLint, TS, ... all configurations are inside.
